examples: Amygdalus sect. Pedunculatae T.T. Yu & L.T. Lu in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 23(3): 209 (1988); Pygeum wilsonii var. macrophyllum L.T. Lu in Acta Bot. Yunnanica 10(3): 363 (1988), as 'Ling Di Lu'.
source: from 'A Dictionary of the Families and Genera of Chinese Seed Plants' ed How Foon-chew (1982). Index Herb. ed. 8.
